forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 14 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a gentle embrace of sunshine, though a notable chill lingers in the air, whispering reminders of the city's coastal embrace. With temperatures hovering around 65, the early warmth will gradually cede to a cooler presence, specifically around 63, as the west-southwest winds pick up their playful dance, brushing through the streets at 23 mph. The gusts, reminiscent of nature’s spirited laughter, reach up to 29 mph, sending a hint of excitement into an otherwise serene day.

As evening draws near, the skies will grow more modest, cloaked in a layer of clouds, with temperatures settling near a comfortable 57. The winds will persist, maintaining their lively rhythm and providing a refreshing backdrop to the early night. Given this fluctuation from sun to cloud, dressing in layers is wise, allowing one to adapt to the ever-changing scenery—perhaps a light jacket or a cozy cardigan will serve well against the breezy whispers. The day invites contemplation: a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps a quiet corner in a café to savor a moment and watch the rhythm of life unfold, or even an intimate gathering with friends to share stories under the softening light. Embrace the lingering magic of a San Francisco afternoon and let its subtle charms guide your path.
